Class WriteRecord

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class WriteRecord
extends java.lang.Object

      • getDate

        private static java.lang.String getDate()
        Accessor of the date (year, month and day) for the append method to save into CSV
        Returns:
        String of year, month, day

      • appendIndividualSaleRecord

        public static void appendIndividualSaleRecord(java.lang.String menuItem,
                                              int quantity)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        public method for printInvoice method in the order class to append new individual sale record in the CSV for the sale revenue report
        Parameters:
        menuItem - is the name of menu item in the invoice, quantity the quantity of each menu item in the invoice the method append the menuItem, quantity, date and uses the CSVWriter class to save data into the individualsalerecord CSV
        quantity - the amount of the menu item
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error caught

      • appendRevenueRecord

        public static void appendRevenueRecord(double netSales)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        public method for printInvoice method in the order class to append new revenue record in the CSV for the sale revenue report
        Parameters:
        netSales - is the net price of each invoice printed the method append the netSale, date and uses the CSVWriter class to save data into the revenuerecord CSV
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error caught
